about.title: About
about.description: College senior majoring in computer science with a concentration insecurity. While my concentration is in security I have taken more interest in software development and full stack development. Looking to begin my career after my graduation in May 2024.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I started learning web dev with HTML, CSS, and Javascript first. Since then, I have learned Java and Python during school. As I have gotten more interested in full stack development I learned React and Node.js
skills.html: I have been making websites since I was a kid and am well versed in HTML
skills.css: I can comfortably create reactive websites using pure CSS
skills.javascript: I have used Javascript for many years to make websites and games
skills.java: Using Java I have built games, analysis software, and a datastructure visualizer
skills.python: I have used python for many of my courses and have made web scrapers with it
skills.node: I have built several backends from to-do lists to stores using Node.js
skills.react: React is my new main frontend framework and have built several sites with it
